# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text) # Split the input into words
    output = "" # Initialize output string
    line = "" # Current line being built
    for word in words
        if (length(line) + length(word)) > text_width
            # Add newline and append current word to next line
            output *= "\n$line $word"
            line = ""
        else
            # Append word to the current line
            line *= " $(word)"
        end
    end
    return output # Return the final wrapped string
end
